mainText:
Hi Steve,

I always wanted to write you an email but i feared that you wouldn't reply.
But now you are in a position where you know what's going on.

I just wanted to say that you have been an inspiration for me. The only way
that i can thank you is by listening to what you had said- you had asked us
to follow are hearts. I will Steve. I want to change me life. And i will
start now.

Thank you for all that you've done for us.

Rest in Peace.
author: Raashid
